amendment.description: To authorize, with an offset, an additional $6,000,000 for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Navy, for research and development on Long Wavelength Array low frequency radio astronomy instruments.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1544 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1544 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S12589-12595) To authorize, with an offset, an additional $6,000,000 for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Navy, for research and development on Long Wavelength Array low frequency radio astronomy instruments.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1544 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1544 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Domenici.
